Summary I got 5 years degree in Mechanical Engineering in Parma University (Italy) in 1998. 
I am working since 2002 in Sidel Group in Parma. My current job in the last 5 years has been executed as Product Support & Field Services Manager for Aseptic Equipments; before the actual experience, I occupied other roles in the same company. 
By the way, in the whole period in Sidel, I spent 2 years, resident in China, as Product Manager for hot filling ultraclean technology. And before such experience, I travel worldwide for many years as Problem Solver for technical department: 
Starting from 2007, I have managed teams and collaborators, working at back-office and on field. 
I am currently managing a staff composed by almost 50 collaborators employed for administrative jobs (i.e. logistics and part administration), back-office (i.e. back office technical support) and field services activities (i.e. product experts with long experience in the company or young talent engineers just employed after the graduation).
